member.name: T:SharpVectors.Renderers.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.IsBoldSimulated
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether to simulate a bold weight for the glyphs represented by the typeface.
member.value: true if bold simulation is used for glyphs; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.IsObliqueSimulated
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether to simulate an italic style for the glyphs represented by the typeface.
member.value: true if italic simulation is used for glyphs; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.StrikethroughPosition
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the distance from the baseline to the strikethrough for the typeface.
member.value: A that indicates the strikethrough position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.StrikethroughThickness
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the strikethrough relative to the font em size.
member.value: A that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.UnderlinePosition
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the distance of the underline from the baseline for the typeface.
member.value: A that indicates the underline position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.UnderlineThickness
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the underline relative to the font em size for the typeface.
member.value: A that indicates the underline thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Renderers.Texts.WpfGlyphTextBuilder.OverlinePosition
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the distance of the overline from the baseline for the typeface.
member.value: A that indicates the overline position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.
